name: polkadot-cli
description: CLI tool for querying Polkadot-ecosystem on-chain state

scripts.build: bun build src/cli.ts --outfile dist/cli.mjs --target node --packages external && bun run build:shebang
scripts.build:shebang: bun -e "const f='dist/cli.mjs'; const s=await Bun.file(f).text(); await Bun.write(f, s.replace('#!/usr/bin/env bun', '#!/usr/bin/env node').replace('// @bun\n',''))"
